borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p>The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><ul><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">THAXTED HOUSE/ 101&nbsp;Rev 1 -&nbsp;SITE LOCATION PLANS - 09.06.21</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">THAXTED HOUSE/ 106&nbsp;Rev 1 -&nbsp;PROPOSED SITE PLAN - 09.06.21</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">THAXTED HOUSE/ 107 Rev 1 -&nbsp;PROPOSED SITE ELEVATION - EAST FACING - 09.06.21</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">THAXTED HOUSE/ 108&nbsp;Rev 1 -&nbsp;PROPOSED SITE ELEVATION - SOUTH FACING - 09.06.21</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">THAXTED HOUSE/ 109&nbsp;Rev 1 -&nbsp;PROPOSED SITE ELEVATION - WEST FACING - 09.06.21</span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">THAXTED HOUSE/ 111&nbsp;Rev 1 -&nbsp;PROPOSED ROOF LEVEL ELEVATIONS - 09.06.21</span></span></li></ul><p>No other drawings or documents apply.</p>
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
site_name: Telecomms Station On Roof, Thaxted House
description: Installation of 8x antennae dishes and associated works
